visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly temperature data for a year. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and configure other settings such as chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes an animation duration of 1000 milliseconds. The background color of the chart is set to a light gray (#f9f9f9), and the margins are adjusted to provide better spacing. The x-axis displays the months of the year with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius, also with styled labels and a title. The data series includes monthly temperature data with a custom color (#FF6347). The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme. Additionally, the spline plot options include markers with a specified radius and color to enhance the visual representation of the data points.
